00002         Drawing related static class.
00003         This provides access to the game's Surfaces, color value conversion
00004         and text aligning helpers.
00005 */
00006

00011 #include <Surface.h>

00013 class Drawing
00014 {
00015 public:
00016 
00017         static RectangleStruct &SurfaceDimensions_Hidden;
00018 
00019         static ColorStruct &TooltipColor;
00020 
00021         //TextBox dimensions for tooltip-style boxes
00022         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY, int nMargin)
00023                 {
00024                         RectangleStruct box;
00025                         RectangleStruct* p_box=&box;
00026 
00027                         int ymarg=nMargin+2;
00028                         PUSH_IMM(nMargin);              //X Margin
00029                         PUSH_IMM(ymarg);                //Y Margin - should add 2, because X margin adds to 2 internally!
00030                         PUSH_IMM(0);                    //X Offset
00031                         PUSH_VAR32(nY);
00032                         PUSH_VAR32(nX);
00033                         SET_REG32(edx,pText);
00034                         SET_REG32(ecx,p_box);
00035                         CALL(0x4A59E0);
00036 
00037                         return box;
00038                 }
00039 
00040         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, int nX, int nY)
00041                 { return GetTextBox(pText, nX, nY, 2); }
00042 
00043         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint)
00044                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, 2); }
00045 
00046         static RectangleStruct GetTextBox(const wchar_t* pText, Point2D* pPoint, int nMargin)
00047                 { return GetTextBox(pText, pPoint->X, pPoint->Y, nMargin); }
00048 
00049         //TextDimensions for text aligning
00050         static RectangleStruct GetTextDimensions(const wchar_t* pText)
00051                 {
00052                         RectangleStruct dim=GetTextBox(pText,0,0,0);
00053 
00054                         dim.X=0;
00055                         dim.Y=0;
00056                         dim.Width-=4;
00057                         dim.Height-=2;
00058 
00059                         return dim;
00060                 }
00061 
00062         //Stuff
00063 
00064         // RGB
00065         static WORD Color16bit(ColorStruct* pColor)     //Converts an RGB color to a 16bit color value.
00066                 { return (pColor->B >> 3) | ((pColor->G >> 2) << 5) | ((pColor->R >> 3) << 11); }
00067 
00068         static ColorStruct WordColor(WORD bits)
00069                 {
00070                         ColorStruct color;
00071                         color.R = ((bits & 0xF800) >> 11) << 3;
00072                         color.G = (BYTE)((bits & 0x07E0) >> 5) << 2; // msvc stupid warning
00073                         color.B = (bits & 0x001F) << 3;
00074                         return color;
00075                 }
00076 };
00077 
00078 //A few preset 16bit colors.
00079 #define         COLOR_BLACK  0x0000
00080 #define         COLOR_WHITE  0xFFFF
00081 
00082 #define         COLOR_RED    0xF800
00083 #define         COLOR_GREEN  0x07E0
00084 #define         COLOR_BLUE   0x001F
00085 
00086 #define         COLOR_PURPLE (COLOR_RED | COLOR_BLUE)
